metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2041 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: libraries/common.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.13, 4.4.x before4.4.15.3, and 4.5.x before 4.5.4 does not use a constant-time algorithm forcomparing CSRF tokens, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypassintended access restrictions by measuring time differences.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
